item.description:
Polling places across Massachusetts will be open from 7am till 8pm. You must be registered as a Republican or Unenrolled (Independent) to vote for Ron Paul.

By the day of the primary, we should have a large list of Ron Paul voters. We will be calling to make sure every one of them votes.
item.why: Massachusetts has proportional delegate selection. If Ron Paul gets 15% in the primary, he aguomatically gets some delegates pledged to him at the National Convention.
item.name: Primary election
